Html:
Hi,

I have tried deploying an installation of SAPgui 7.50 with a single .exe installer file. The file resides on the WSUS server. The update package is a normal update NOT a custom one. I get the following errors in WPP console:
Error Code      Message                                                                                                 Status
0               (Unable to Find Ressource:) ReportingEvent.Client.181;Parameters: SAPGui 7.50                           Unknown
-2147023293     Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error 0x80070643: SAPGui      Failed
0               Agent has finished detecting items.                                                                     DetectionComplete
The following is the WindowsUpdate.log: (the last of it.....)

2017-10-03 07:34:27.0684822 6268  2196  Reporter        [0]187C.0894::10/03/2017-07:34:27.068 [reporting]REPORT EVENT: {6E5D0152-E817-4A06-8AF3-F670C48C3154}   2017-10-03 07:34:17:262+0200    1   182 [AGENT_INSTALLING_FAILED]   101 {4315940A-C533-4BF1-A4D7-479FC67E6C9C}  1   80070643    UpdateOrchestrator  Failure Content Install Installation Failure: Windows failed to install the following update with error 0x80070643: SAPGui 7.50.
On the Client I also get the error 0x80070643.

When I install the .exe file manually I am able to install it without any problems. Except that I have to be local administrator :-/

Does anyone tried something similar?

And yes - I have successfully deployed som other files (.msi) without any issues at all. So the setup is working.

Regards
